resources.string: E-Padhai

Hello blank fragment

E-Padhai is an android application centralised on remote teaching and learning services. It includes realtime upload/ delete of tests, classroom etc. through a singal window interface. The admin can also add faculty and students in a class and subsequently only that faculty and students will have their personalised account access with some amazing features for each of them. The login activity is controlled by Google Firebase authentication hence giving an edge of security. The app is basically a combined version of university website, its ERP portal and google classroom. The potential of app allows it to be highly scalable and its application can be easily implemented within any organisation which requires a single channel for information sharing. For any further details or any professional work, they are available at the under mentioned contact details.
